Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.core.Template

  • Packages that use Template 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core
    The most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Stared in the Manual.)
    org.apache.freemarker.core.templateresolver
    Template lookup, loading, and caching: Base classes/interfaces
    org.apache.freemarker.core.util
    Various classes used by core FreeMarker code but might be useful outside of it too.
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet
    Servlet for legacy "Model 2" frameworks that allows using FreeMarker templates instead of JSP as the MVC View (see in the Manual), also custom JSP tag support.

    • Uses of Template in org.apache.freemarker.core

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core that return Template 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Template Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String name, String content, Configuration config)
      Same as createPlainTextTemplate(String, String, String, Configuration, String) with null sourceName argument.
      static Template Template.createPlainTextTemplate(String name, String sourceName, String content, Configuration config, String encoding)
      Creates a Template that only contains a single block of static text, no dynamic content.
      Template Environment.getCurrentTemplate()
      Returns the Template that we are "lexically" inside at the moment.
      Template Environment.getMainTemplate()
      Returns the topmost Template, with other words, the one for which this Environment was created.
      Template Environment.Namespace.getTemplate() 
      Template Configuration.getTemplate(String name)
      Retrieves the template with the given name from the template templateResolver, loading it into the templateResolver first if it's missing/staled.
      Template Configuration.getTemplate(String name, Locale locale)
      Shorthand for getTemplate(name, locale, null, null, true, false).
      Template Configuration.getTemplate(String name, Locale locale, Object customLookupCondition, String encoding, boolean parseAsFTL, boolean ignoreMissing)
      Retrieves the template with the given name (and according the specified further parameters) from the template templateResolver, loading it into the templateResolver first if it's missing/staled.
      Template Configuration.getTemplate(String name, Locale locale, String encoding)
      Shorthand for getTemplate(name, locale, null, encoding, true, false).
      Template Configuration.getTemplate(String name, Locale locale, String encoding, boolean parseAsFTL)
      Shorthand for getTemplate(name, locale, null, encoding, parseAsFTL, false).
      Template Configuration.getTemplate(String name, Locale locale, String encoding, boolean parseAsFTL, boolean ignoreMissing)
      Shorthand for getTemplate(name, locale, null, encoding, parseAsFTL, ignoreMissing).
      Template Configuration.getTemplate(String name, String encoding)
      Shorthand for getTemplate(name, null, null, encoding, true, false).
      Template Environment.getTemplateForImporting(String name)
      Gets a template for importing; used with Environment.importLib(Template importedTemplate, String namespace).
      Template Environment.getTemplateForInclusion(String name, String encoding, boolean parse)
      Same as Environment.getTemplateForInclusion(String, String, boolean, boolean) with false ignoreMissing argument.
      Template Environment.getTemplateForInclusion(String name, String encoding, boolean parseAsFTL, boolean ignoreMissing)
      Gets a template for inclusion; used for implementing Environment.include(Template includedTemplate).
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.core with parameters of type Template 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TemplateConfiguration.apply(Template template)
      Sets those settings of the Template which aren't yet set in the Template and are set in this TemplateConfiguration, leaves the other settings as is.
      Object CustomAttribute.get(Template template)
      Gets the value of a Template-scope attribute from the given Template.
      Environment.Namespace Environment.importLib(Template loadedTemplate, String targetNsVarName)
      Does what the #import directive does, but with an already loaded template.
      void Environment.include(Template includedTemplate)
      Processes a Template in the context of this Environment, including its output in the Environment's Writer.
      Class TemplateClassResolver.resolve(String className, Environment env, Template template)
      Gets a Class based on the class name.
      void CustomAttribute.set(Object value, Template template)
      Sets the value of a Template-scope attribute in the given Template.
